title: Customer Support VA Experienced (Shopify & Fashion E-commerce)
job_overview:
Are you an experienced Virtual Assistant with a passion for fashion and top-tier customer service? We're a fast-paced e-commerce brand in the fashion dropshipping space, and we’re seeking a Customer Support VA who’s tech-savvy, detail-oriented, and ready to grow with us.

If you’re skilled in Shopify, confident in your communication, and organized in handling support operations, we’d love to hear from you.

What You’ll Bring to the Table:
A minimum of 2 years in e-commerce customer support

Solid, hands-on knowledge of the Shopify platform

Fluent, professional English writing skills

Familiarity with Google Sheets for tracking and internal updates

High-speed internet with reliable performance (speed test screenshot required)

Bonus if you have backup internet and/or power supply

Committed to a full-time schedule and looking for long-term growth

Ideal Candidate Profile:
You take initiative and don’t wait to be told what to do

You’re dependable and deliver consistent results

You’re comfortable working with SOPs but can also adapt and think on your feet

You enjoy problem-solving and turning customer issues into positive experiences

You’re looking for a stable role with room to expand your responsibilities

Day-to-Day Tasks Include:
Responding to customer queries via email and helpdesk tools

Managing returns, refunds, and order modifications

Addressing shipping delays, tracking requests, and other logistics concerns

Keeping data organized in shared Google Sheets

Coordinating with suppliers for updates and problem resolution

Providing clear weekly updates and raising recurring issues to management

What You’ll Get in Return:
A secure, long-term role with a reliable e-commerce brand

Weekly payments delivered on time

A strong, supportive remote culture that values your input

Flexibility to work from home

Opportunities to expand your responsibilities and grow your role

Ready to Apply?
Please send us the following:

A brief written introduction about who you are

Your up-to-date resume

A short video (1–2 minutes) describing your customer support background and Shopify experience

A screenshot of your internet speed (speedtest.net)

Mention if you have a backup power source or internet connection

Note: Only candidates with proven experience in Shopify, Google Sheets, and e-commerce customer support will be considered.
